Gaza

Gaza is a small Palestinian territory located on the eastern coast of the Mediterranean Sea. It is bordered by Israel to the east and north and Egypt to the south. Gaza is part of the Palestinian state and has a complex history marked by political conflicts, humanitarian crises, and tensions with Isreal.
